testimonials.title: What Our Pilgrims Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from pilgrims who have experienced spiritual journeys with us
testimonials.text1: Alhamdulillah, my Hajj experience with Sabil Al-Hajj was truly blessed. The arrangements were perfect, and the team's support made the entire journey comfortable and spiritually enriching.
testimonials.text2: The Umrah package was exceptional. Everything was well-organized, from airport pickup to hotel accommodations. The spiritual guidance provided was invaluable.
testimonials.text3: I highly recommend Sabil Al-Hajj for anyone planning pilgrimage. Their attention to detail and commitment to service excellence is truly commendable.

questions.secure_booking_answer: Yes, all bookings are secured with multiple layers of protection. We use encrypted payment systems and provide booking confirmations immediately.
questions.support_247_answer: Absolutely! Our dedicated support team is available 24/7 throughout your pilgrimage journey, including during your stay in the Holy Lands.
questions.customize_package: Can I customize my pilgrimage package?
questions.customize_package_answer: Yes, we offer fully customizable packages. You can choose your preferred airlines, hotels, duration, and additional services to match your specific needs and budget.
questions.required_documents: What documents do I need for Umrah or Hajj?
questions.required_documents_answer: You will need a valid passport (valid for at least 6 months), a visa, vaccination certificates (meningitis and COVID-19), and travel insurance. We assist with all visa processing and document requirements to ensure a smooth journey.
questions.first_time_guidance: Do you provide guidance for first-time pilgrims?
questions.first_time_guidance_answer: Absolutely! We provide comprehensive pre-departure guidance, step-by-step ritual instructions, experienced multilingual guides, and continuous support throughout your journey. Our virtual reality experience also helps you prepare mentally and spiritually.
questions.health_safety: What are your health and safety measures?
questions.health_safety_answer: We maintain strict health protocols, provide travel insurance, have 24/7 medical support, ensure all accommodations meet safety standards, and follow all government health guidelines for international travel.
questions.visa_processing_time_answer: It varies by season and country, typically from several days to weeks. We inform you of the expected duration as soon as we receive your complete file.
questions.form_assistance: Do you help with filling forms and translating documents?
questions.form_assistance_answer: Yes, we assist with filling applications, verifying data accuracy, and translating/formatting required documents according to your country.
questions.package_includes: What exactly does the package price include?
questions.package_includes_answer: Includes (according to package): flight tickets, hotel, transportation, visit program, insurance, guidance, and support service. Each package has clear "comprehensive details" within the platform.
questions.room_type_answer: According to package: shared rooms (economical) or private (more comfort and privacy). You choose this during booking.
questions.elderly_suitable: Are packages suitable for elderly people?
questions.elderly_suitable_answer: Yes, we have "comfort" packages with lighter itineraries, closer hotels, and additional support.

hajj.title: Hajj Pilgrimage
hajj.subtitle: Embark on the sacred journey of Hajj with our comprehensive services
hajj.description1: Hajj is the fifth pillar of Islam and a spiritual journey that every Muslim who is physically and financially able must undertake at least once in their lifetime. We provide complete Hajj packages that include accommodation, transportation, and expert guidance throughout the pilgrimage.
hajj.description2: Our Hajj services include premium accommodation near the Holy Sites, transportation between key locations, expert religious guides, and comprehensive support throughout your spiritual journey.
hajj.description3: Contact us today to learn more about our Hajj packages and begin your sacred journey.

hotels.title: Premium Hotels
hotels.subtitle: Luxury accommodations for your spiritual journey
hotels.description1: We partner with the finest hotels in Mecca and Medina, ensuring your stay is comfortable and convenient for your pilgrimage. Our accommodations are strategically located to minimize travel time to the Holy Sites.
hotels.description2: All our partner hotels provide halal cuisine, prayer facilities, and modern amenities while maintaining the spiritual atmosphere appropriate for pilgrims.
hotels.description3: Experience comfort and convenience during your pilgrimage with our premium hotel accommodations.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for Hajj and Umrah pilgrimage services

our_mission.title: Our Mission
our_mission.description: We are a dedicated team of professionals passionate about helping Muslims fulfill their religious duty of Hajj and Umrah. With years of experience in pilgrimage services, we ensure every aspect of your spiritual journey is handled with care, respect, and excellence.

our_experience.title: Our Experience
our_experience.description: For over a decade, we have been serving pilgrims from around the world, providing comprehensive Hajj and Umrah packages that combine comfort, convenience, and spiritual fulfillment. Our team consists of experienced professionals and religious scholars who understand the significance of this sacred journey.

about.contact_message: Ready to embark on your spiritual journey? Contact us today to learn more about our services and begin planning your Hajj or Umrah pilgrimage.

global_infos.title: Global Infos
global_infos.guides_subtitle: Experienced guides to accompany you on your pilgrimage journey.
global_infos.guide_badge: Certified Religious Guide for Sabil Alhajj Platform
global_infos.guide_section_guidance_title: Trusted Religious Guidance for Ramadan Umrah 2026
global_infos.guide_section_guidance_para: Umrah in Ramadan is a spiritual experience that requires clear Sharia guidance and religious accompaniment. The Sabil Alhajj platform relies on a guide with Sharia qualification and field experience for its Ramadan Umrah 2026 programs.
global_infos.guide_section_guidance_para2: Shaykh Younes Atliboun is a graduate of the Sharia College at the Grand Mosque in Makkah, completed Quran memorization since 2013, teaches Quranic circles in Makkah, and has over 10 years of experience in religious guidance. His clear, practical style facilitates understanding of rites and provides tranquility during Umrah, especially in crowded times.
global_infos.guide_section_role_title: The Guide's Role within the Sabil Alhajj Platform
global_infos.guide_section_role_para: The religious guide oversees the complete Sharia aspect for Umrah performers, from pre-travel preparation to explaining rites in the field, offering spiritual support, and answering Sharia questions throughout the journey in Makkah.
global_infos.guide_role_item_1: Practical step-by-step explanation of the rites.
global_infos.guide_role_item_2: Sharia guidance before and during Umrah.
global_infos.guide_role_item_3: Field accompaniment inside the Grand Mosque.
global_infos.guide_role_item_4: Spiritual support to maximize Ramadan's atmosphere.
global_infos.guide_why_item_1: Graduate of Sharia College at the Grand Mosque in Makkah.
global_infos.guide_why_item_4: Author of the book "The Professional Guide".
global_infos.guide_why_item_5: Simplified style suitable for all levels.
global_infos.guide_section_platform_para: Umrah performers can view programs and choose suitable options through the Sabil Alhajj platform, with professional organization and trusted religious accompaniment for focused worship.
global_infos.guide_1_description: Certified guide with years of experience in Hajj and Umrah. Fluent in multiple languages.
global_infos.guide_2_description: Specialized in Saudi heritage and logistics. Ensures a smooth and enriching experience.
global_infos.guide_3_description: Dedicated to group coordination and 24/7 support throughout your journey.
global_infos.refund_condition_1: The request must be submitted in writing.
global_infos.refund_condition_2: The reason for cancellation must be clearly stated.
global_infos.refund_condition_3: Any applicable supporting documents must be attached.
global_infos.refund_calculation_1: More than 30 days before departure: 90% refund.
global_infos.refund_calculation_2: Between 15 and 30 days before departure: 75% refund.
global_infos.refund_calculation_3: Between 7 and 14 days before departure: 50% refund.
global_infos.refund_calculation_4: Less than 7 days before departure: No refund.
global_infos.refund_processing_text: Refunds will be processed within 15 to 30 business days after approval.
global_infos.important_note_1: Certain services (e.g., non-refundable flights/hotels) may not be eligible for a refund.
global_infos.important_note_2: Cancellation fees (e.g., administrative fees) may apply.
global_infos.important_note_3: The policy is subject to change, and users should review the latest version before making a booking.
global_infos.policy_1: The information provided is for guidance and educational purposes only and does not constitute a legally binding religious ruling.
global_infos.policy_2: The guide is not responsible for any misunderstanding resulting from applying the guidance without consulting the relevant official authorities.
global_infos.policy_3: All consultations are handled in strict confidence in accordance with our personal data protection policy.

itinerary.spiritual_journey: Comprehensive spiritual journey with guided visits to holy sites
itinerary.sacred_journey: Sacred journey around the Holy Kaaba and sacred sites
itinerary.madinah_masjid_desc: Located in the heart of Madinah, Al-Masjid An-Nabawi is the second holiest mosque in Islam. It is renowned for its magnificent architecture and spacious courtyards. Visiting gives Muslims the honor of praying in the Rawdah Al-Sharifah and greeting the Prophet Muhammad (PBUH).
itinerary.quba_mosque: Quba Mosque – The First Mosque in Islam
itinerary.quba_mosque_desc: Established after the Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) migrated to Madinah. Located south of Al-Masjid An-Nabawi, it is known for its peaceful atmosphere. A visit allows pilgrims to experience the spirit of the early days of Islam.
itinerary.two_qiblahs: The Mosque of the Two Qiblahs
itinerary.qiblatain_desc: One of the city's most significant historical landmarks. It is where the Prophet (PBUH) received the revelation to change the Qiblah direction from Jerusalem to the Kaaba in Makkah.
itinerary.sacred_mosque_desc: The Grand Mosque of Makkah, also known as Al-Masjid Al-Haram, is the largest and most sacred mosque in Islam. It surrounds the Kaaba, the holiest site in Islam and the direction of prayer (Qiblah) for all Muslims worldwide. The mosque can accommodate up to 4 million worshippers and features the Zamzam Well and Maqam Ibrahim.
itinerary.mount_arafat: Mount Arafat – The Mount of Mercy
itinerary.day_of_arafah: Site of the Day of Arafah
itinerary.mount_arafat_desc: Located 20km southeast of Makkah, Mount Arafat holds immense significance in Islamic history. This is where Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) delivered his farewell sermon and where pilgrims gather for the most important day of Hajj. The plain of Arafat symbolizes mercy, forgiveness, and the Day of Judgment.
itinerary.mina_valley: Mina Valley – The Valley of Tents
itinerary.stoning_devil: Site of the Stoning of the Devil
itinerary.mina_valley_desc: A valley located between Makkah and Muzdalifah, Mina is where pilgrims stay during Hajj and perform the ritual of stoning the devil. The valley contains Jamarat Bridge where pilgrims throw pebbles at three pillars symbolizing the rejection of evil. The area transforms dramatically during Hajj season.
itinerary.cave_of_hira_desc: Located on the northwest side of Mount Nur, the Cave of Hira is where Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) received the first revelation from Allah through Angel Gabriel. This cave marks the beginning of Islam and is a place of deep spiritual reflection. The cave is about 4km from Makkah city center.
itinerary.home_to_cave: Home to the Cave of Hira
itinerary.mount_noor_desc: Mount Noor, also known as Jabal Al-Noor, is the mountain where the Cave of Hira is located. This mountain holds great significance as it was the place where the Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) would retreat for meditation and worship. The mountain offers stunning views and a peaceful environment for contemplation.
itinerary.haram_district_hotel: Al-Haram District Hotel — Steps from the Kaaba
itinerary.haram_district_desc: Located in the prestigious Al-Haram district, just steps away from the Grand Mosque and the Holy Kaaba. Experience unparalleled proximity to the holiest sites in Islam with modern amenities and traditional hospitality.
itinerary.day_arafah: Site of the Day of Arafah
itinerary.hera_home: Home to the Cave of Hira

policies.title: Price Policy, Payment Methods & Cancellation Policy
policies.subtitle: SabilHajj Platform — Transparent Pricing & Clear Terms
policies.description: At SabilHajj, we believe in complete transparency in our pricing and policies. Our payment structure and cancellation terms are designed to protect both pilgrims and service quality.
policies.payment_policy_content: We facilitate payment for our customers through a simple and clear installment system that ensures complete comfort and full transparency.
payment_policy_list: First Payment (50%) - Upon Booking: Confirming the package and starting visa and hotel procedures
Second Payment (25%) - After 15 days: Confirming hotel arrangements and essential services
Third Payment (25%) - 30 days before travel: Completing the amount and issuing final travel tickets
policies.payment_policy_footer: All payments are processed securely through approved payment methods.
policies.visa_refund_content: Visa processing involves specific regulations and fees that affect refund policies:
visa_refund_list: Once the visa is issued, its value cannot be refunded
Visa fees are deducted from any amount paid
Processing fees are non-refundable regardless of cancellation timing
policies.visa_refund_footer: Visa regulations are subject to the issuing country's policies and cannot be modified.
policies.flight_refund_content: Flight ticket refunds are governed by airline policies and fare conditions:
flight_refund_list: Refund policy depends on the terms and conditions of the airline through which the booking was made
Cancellation or change fees are applied according to each airline's system
Some tickets may be non-refundable depending on the booked class
policies.flight_refund_footer: Airline policies vary and are beyond our direct control.
policies.hotel_refund_content: Hotel cancellation policies depend on booking terms and timing:
hotel_refund_list: Full refund is available if cancellation is requested 20 days before the trip date
Cancellations made less than 20 days in advance may incur deductions depending on hotel availability and provider policy
Special rates and packages may have different cancellation terms
policies.hotel_refund_footer: Hotel policies are set by individual properties and booking platforms.
policies.cancellation_processing_content: All cancellation requests are handled with care and transparency:
cancellation_processing_list: Cancellation requests are processed within a reasonable time frame
Customers are notified of the final refund percentage before processing
Refunds are issued to the original payment method within 7-14 business days
Processing fees may apply depending on the cancellation timing
policies.cancellation_processing_footer: We strive to minimize financial impact while maintaining service quality.
policies.important_terms_content: Completing the booking through SabilHajj constitutes explicit understanding of:
policies.clear_pricing: Clear pricing with no hidden fees
policies.transparency_slogan: Transparent Pricing • Fair Policies • Trust Built on Clarity

itinerary.central_hotel: Central Area Hotel — Near Al-Masjid An-Nabawi
itinerary.central_area_desc: Located inside the Central Area of Madinah, about a 7-minute walk from Al-Masjid An-Nabawi. Provides practical proximity and easy access to the Haram throughout your stay.
itinerary.haram_hotel: Al-Haram District Hotel — Steps from the Kaaba

itinerary.day1_desc: Welcome to Saudi Arabia! Transfer to your hotel in Mecca for rest and preparation for Umrah rituals.
itinerary.day24_desc: Perform Umrah rituals including Tawaf around the Kaaba and Sa'i between Safa and Marwa. Spiritual guidance provided.
itinerary.day5_desc: Depart for Medina to visit the Prophet's Mosque and experience the blessed atmosphere of the city.
itinerary.day68_desc: Daily prayers in Masjid An-Nabawi, visit to Quba Mosque, and spiritual reflection in the blessed city.
itinerary.day9_desc: Final blessings and departure for your return journey home with unforgettable spiritual memories.

responsibility.title: Responsibility and Organization Policy
responsibility.subtitle: SabilHajj Platform — SabilHajj
responsibility.description: SabilHajj is committed to providing an organized, transparent, and respectful religious travel experience, based on complete clarity in services and responsibilities, ensuring the pilgrim's rights and providing peace of mind.
responsibility.scope_content: SabilHajj platform is committed to implementing the program as shown and announced within the selected package page, and this includes only the services mentioned within the program details, such as:
scope_list: Accommodation according to the specified category and location
Religious guidance and group accompaniment during Umrah performance
responsibility.scope_footer: SabilHajj does not bear any commitment to services or requests not mentioned within the announced program.
responsibility.airlines_content: Some components of the trip depend on independent and approved providers (such as airlines, hotels, and transportation companies). SabilHajj therefore:
airlines_list: Flight schedules, delays, cancellations, or modifications are subject to the terms and regulations of the operating airline
SabilHajj does not bear responsibility for circumstances beyond its control, such as: Weather conditions, Operational decisions of airlines, or Official/emergency decisions
responsibility.airlines_footer: SabilHajj is committed in all cases to informing the pilgrim and providing organizational support as much as possible without bearing direct responsibility for these situations.
responsibility.group_content: All programs offered through SabilHajj are organized group programs, and are based on:
group_list: Respecting the instructions of the guide and supervisors
Collective cooperation to ensure the smooth running of the trip
responsibility.group_footer: Any violation of these controls may affect the general organization without SabilHajj bearing responsibility for that.
responsibility.requests_content: In order to maintain the quality of organization and fairness among all group members at SabilHajj:
requests_list: Any requests or additional services outside the program framework (such as special arrangements, individual changes, or unannounced services) are not within SabilHajj's commitments
Any individual arrangements outside the program are made at the pilgrim's personal responsibility
responsibility.visa_content: SabilHajj provides technical and organizational support to the pilgrim in visa procedures according to the selected type. Note that:
visa_list: The selected visa type (Umrah or tourist) may affect the nature of insurance, some services, and package cost
The official regulations approved by the competent authorities remain the final reference in all cases
responsibility.transparency_content: Completing the booking through SabilHajj constitutes explicit consent from the pilgrim to:
transparency_list: The details of the selected program
commitment_list: Do not burden the pilgrim with unclear commitments
Work to organize the trip professionally and calmly
Leave to the pilgrim what is most important: focusing on worship
responsibility.slogan: Clear Organization • Defined Responsibility • Trust Built on Transparency

trustedPartners.subtitle: We are proud to partner with the best companies in Hajj and Umrah services
